title: Integrated Education on Theological Worldviews and Scientific Inquiry Through Online Asynchronous Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of science and foundational understanding of the Christian worldview
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online learning design for science-theology integrated education in Christian school settings, with flexible progression using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Students can explain the connection between scientific facts and biblical values through experimental observations.
Learners participate at least 80% in the process of interpreting scientific discoveries from a theological perspective on online discussion boards.
Students record at least three cases of integrating science and faith in digital portfolios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
